verbs.description: atchison police officer returns gunfire after [V: being] shot at injuring homeowner the kansas bureau of investigations is investigating after a man with two guns fired at an atchison police officer and the officer returned fire officials say atchison county kansas kbi police atchison officer kansas bureau of investigation brian boldridge atchison county
